content:
| Intent ID     | Description    | Slot ID    | Description | Examples |
|----------  | --------------   | ----------      |
| JGYDS  | Issue with the functionality of a particular software for email or calendar | 64658    | Software for email or calendar purposes | Google, Microsoft, Teams, Outlook |
| HBREQ  | Issue with the hardware for the software such as screen problems     | 21654    | Devices used for email or calendar purposes | phone, tablet, computer |
| NUEWY | Issue with a particular email or calendar event.   | 56786    | Subjects of emails or names of emails or events | Meeting with John, Important Update about Your Insurance |
| IWERI     | Issue with the date or time of emails and calendars not being correct.  | 21687   | Dates or times of events      | Friday, 12/30/2024, Feb 14, 3/7, 3:15PM |
